label: General updates
descriptionHtml:
• Captain's Modesecond pick phase is changed fromDire/Radiant/Dire/RadianttoDire/Radiant/Radiant/Dire(assuming Radiant is first pick)
  • MultipleCritical Strikeprocs are now rolled from strongest to weakest and will stop rolling once a proc occurs (this results in the same DPS but is less lilkely to have multiple crits in a row or multiple attacks without a crit.)
  • Cooldown Percentage Reduction no longer stacks (Sources of flat cooldown reduction still stack)
  • Increased HP Regen of all heroes with 0 HP Regen to 0.25
  • Water Runehealing reduced from 80HP to 40HP
  • SecondRoshanno longer drops cheese
  • Neutral Creepsnow drop5neutral items per tier

label: Aeon Disk
descriptionHtml:
• Bonus HP reduced from 300 to 250
  • Aeon Disk Cooldown increases by 20s every time it triggers up to 165s. Cooldown: 105/125/145/165s

label: Abyssal Blade
descriptionHtml: • Bash bonus damage increased from 100 to 120

label: Aether Lens
descriptionHtml: • Mana Regeneration bonus reduced from 3.0 to 2.5

label: Arcane Blink
descriptionHtml: • Ability Cooldown Reduction increased from 25% to 30%

label: Arcane Boots
descriptionHtml: • Replenish Mana mana restored increased from 160 to 175

label: Bottle
descriptionHtml:
• Health Restored reduced from 115 to 110
  • Mana Restored reduced from 65 to 60
  • Restore time increased from 2.5 to 2.7

label: Drum of Endurance
descriptionHtml: • Strength and Intelligence bonuses increased from 6 to 7

label: Enchanted Mango
descriptionHtml: • Cost reduced from 70 to 65

label: Eul's Scepter of Divinity
descriptionHtml: • Mana Regen reduced from 3.5 to 2.5

label: Falcon Blade
descriptionHtml:
• Bonus Attack Damage increased from 10 to 12
  • Bonus Health increased from 175 to 200

label: Gleipnir
descriptionHtml:
• Bonus Intelligence increased from 20 to 24
  • Bonus Strength and Agility increased from 12 to 14
  • Projectile Speed increased from 1750 to 1900

label: Helm of the Overlord
descriptionHtml:
• Reworked Recipe. Now requires Helm of the Dominator, Vladmir's Offering and a 1000 gold recipe (Total cost increased from 6000 to 6050)
  • Bonus Stats reduced from +20 to +8
  • Now can only dominate 1 creep
  • Creep Movement Speed increased from 380 to 400
  • Creep Bonus Attack Damage increased from 25 to 80
  • Creep Bonus Armor increased from 4 to 8
  • Now also grants Vladmir's Aura (+3 armor, +1.75 Mana Regen, +18% damage, +15% Lifesteal in 1200 radius)

label: Hurricane Pike
descriptionHtml:
• Hurricane Thrust duration increased from 5s to 6s
  • Hurricane Thrust max attacks increased from 4 to 5

label: Mage Slayer
descriptionHtml: • Recipe Reworked: Now requires Oblivion Staff + Cloak + 400g Recipe. (total gold cost reduced from 3250 to 2400).

label: Rod of Atos
descriptionHtml:
• Bonus Intelligence increased from 20 to 24
  • Bonus Strength and Agility increased from 10 to 12
  • Projectile Speed increased from 1750 to 1900

label: Sange
descriptionHtml: • Status Resistance reduced from 16 to 12

label: Sentry Ward
descriptionHtml:
• Replenish time decreased from 75 to 70
  • Duration reduced from 8 minutes to 7

label: Silver Edge
descriptionHtml:
• Recipe Reworked. Now requires Shadow Blade + Crystalys + 350g recipe. (Total cost decreased from 5650 to 5300)
  • Now Grants +60 damage, +40 Attack Speed, and a 30% chance of 160% critical damage.
  • Attacks breaking out of invisibility now deal a guaranteed 160% crit with 175 bonus damage

label: Smoke of Deceit
descriptionHtml: • Increased Max Stock from 2 to 3 (Starting stock is still 2)

label: Wind Waker
descriptionHtml: • Recipe reduced from 1600 to 1300 (Total cost reduced from 7125 to 6825)

label: Witch Blade
descriptionHtml:
• Damage per tick reduced from 1x int to 0.75x int
  • Duration increased from 3s to 4s
  • Fixed interaction that caused Witch Blade to give permanent True Strike against magic immune targets

label: Faded Broach
descriptionHtml: • Removed item

label: Ironwood Tree
descriptionHtml: • Removed item

label: Imp Claw
descriptionHtml: • Removed item

label: Illusionist's Cape
descriptionHtml: • Removed item

label: Minotaur Horn
descriptionHtml: • Removed item

label: Orb of Destruction
descriptionHtml: • Removed item

label: Ballista
descriptionHtml: • Removed item

label: Pig Pole
descriptionHtml:
• New Tier 1 Item
  • Grants +6 to all stats
  • Active: Pig, Out! Turns the owner into a pig for 4 seconds and grants +10% movespeed. Cooldown: 25s. Mana Cost: 50

label: Tumbler's Toy
descriptionHtml:
• New Tier 1 Item
  • Grants 200 Mana
  • Active: Vault. Propels your unit forward 300 units. CD: 30s
  • Goes on a 3s cooldown when receiving player based damage

label: Brigand's Blade
descriptionHtml:
• New Tier 2 Item
  • Grants +10 Damage and +10 Attack Speed
  • Passive: Dark Mercy. When attacking an enemy, deals +7 damage for each 10% HP the enemy is missing

label: Fae Grenade
descriptionHtml:
• New Tier 2 Item
  • Grants +20 Movement Speed
  • Active: Shadow Brand. Throws a Bomb to an enemy within 900 range dealing your attack damage and applying a debuff that provides vision of the unit and deals 20dps for 7 seconds. Cooldown: 20s Mana Cost: 25

label: Blast Rig
descriptionHtml:
• New Tier 3 Item
  • Grants 8 armor
  • Passive: Hair Trigger. The next time you get attacked by a hero within 300 range, explode dealing 300 damage to all enemies within a 300 radius and applying a 100% blind for 2.5 seconds. Cooldown: 20s

label: Ascetic's Cap
descriptionHtml:
• New Tier 4 Item
  • Grants 300 Health and 10 Health Regen
  • Passive: Endurance. Whenever a debuff from a player controlled source would be applied to the owner, grant 50% Status resistance for 3 seconds. CD 30s

label: Witchbane
descriptionHtml:
• New Tier 4 Item
  • Passively causes your hero to deal extra magic damage to its target equal to 4% of its max mana on attack
  • Active: Dispel. Dispels all enemies and allies within 300 radius. Cast Range: 500. Mana Cost: 75. Cooldown: 20s

label: Arcanist's Armor
descriptionHtml:
• New Tier 5 Item
  • +5 Armor, +20% Magic Resistance
  • Passively grants +5 armor and +20% Magic Resistance to all allies in a 900 radius
  • Active: Mega Shield. Gains a 35% damage reflection aura in a 900 radius affecting allied units for the next 5 seconds. Cooldown:20s (Does not affect illusions)

label: Chipped Vest
descriptionHtml: • HP Regen reduced from 5 to 4

label: Fairy's Trinket
descriptionHtml: • Bonus Health reduced from 100 to 75

label: Possessed Mask
descriptionHtml: • Lifesteal rescaled from 7% to a flat 7HP per attack

label: Trusty Shovel
descriptionHtml: • Dig Cooldown reduced from 55 to 50

label: Enchanted Quiver
descriptionHtml:
• Bonus Damage decreased from 300 to 200
  • Cooldown decreased from 5s to 4

label: Ceremonial Robe
descriptionHtml: • Debuff is no longer visible if enemies don't have vision of its holder

label: Flicker
descriptionHtml:
• Cooldown increased from 4 to 5s
  • Now blinks in place if the owner received damage in the last 3 seconds

label: Spider Legs
descriptionHtml:
• No longer considered a boot
  • Movement Speed Bonus reduced from 65 to 25

label: Stormcrafter
descriptionHtml: • Stormcrafter no longer triggers if the holder is invisible to the target

label: Fallen Sky
descriptionHtml: • Cast Range reduced from 1600 to 1200

label: Abaddon
descriptionHtml:
• Strengthfrom 23 + 3.0 to 22 + 2.8
  • Aphotic Shield cast range increased from 500 to 550
  • Level 20 Talent -15% Cooldown Reduction replaced with +100 Aphotic Shield Health
  • Level 25 Talent +180 Aphotic Shield Health replaced with -1 Curse of Avernus Attacks Required

label: Alchemist
descriptionHtml:
• Unstable Concoction cooldown reduced from 16s to 13s
  • Unstable Concoction mana cost rescaled from 90/100/110/120 to 100
  • Berserk Potion now additionally grants 30 bonus movement speed
  • Level 10 Talent -6s Unstable Concoction Cooldown replaced with +125 Unstable Concoction Radius

label: Ancient Apparition
descriptionHtml:
• Cold Feet cooldown increased from 10/9/8/7 to 12/11/10/9
  • Ice Blast cooldown increased from 40 to 60/50/40
  • Level 15 Talent +12 HP Regen replaced with +150 Cold Feet Break Distance

label: Anti-Mage
descriptionHtml:
• StrengthGain increased from 1.3 to 1.6
  • Reworked Shard: Counterspell now also passively grants a 900 range offensive aura reducing enemies' magic damage by 10%. Grants triple the effect to enemies within 300 range
  • Blink Fragment scepter now has 3 charges (25s recharge time)
  • Level 10 Talent +15 Attack Speed replaced with -1s Blink Cooldown
  • Level 15 Talent +8 armor replaced with +0.7s Mana Void Stun
  • Level 20 Talent +1s Mana Void Stun replaced with +250 Blink Cast Range

label: Arc Warden
descriptionHtml:
• Magnetic Field shard slow increased from 20% to 30%
  • Level 15 Talent +12% Cooldown Reduction replaced with +8 Armor
  • Level 15 Talent + 40 Attack Speed replaced with +40 Magnetic Field Attack Speed
  • Level 20 talent +100 Attack Range replaced with +40 Flux Damage Per second

label: Axe
descriptionHtml:
• Reworked Shard: Now causes Counter Helix to apply a 6s stacking debuff that reduces attack damage by 20% and increases Counter Helix chance by 10%
  • Level 10 Talent +9Strengthreplaced with +12% Magic Resistance
  • Level 15 Talent +300 Health replaced with +30 Counter Helix Damage

label: Bane
descriptionHtml:
• Brain Sap mana cost decreased from 120/140/160/180 to 100/120/140/160
  • Brain Sap cast range increased from 600 to 625
  • Nightmare now deals 15/20/25/30 Pure damage per second to enemy nightmared targets
  • Fiend's Grip cast Point reduced from 0.4 to 0.2

label: Batrider
descriptionHtml:
• Sticky Napalm bonus damage increased from 6/12/18/24 to 7/14/21/28
  • Firefly damage rescaled from 10/30/50/70 to 20/35/50/65
  • Firefly cooldown increased from 40/38/36/34 to 46/42/38/34

label: Beastmaster
descriptionHtml:
• Aghanim's Shard Call of the Wild Hawk can now be unit targeted, which will cause the hawk to move in the direction of the target and cast dive when/if in range
  • Call of the Wild Boar attack damage increased from 16/32/48/64 to 20/35/50/65
  • Call of the Wild Hawk vision increased from 600/700/800/900 to 750/800/850/900

label: Bloodseeker
descriptionHtml:
• Thirst now heals half the amount on denies
  • Thirst health threshold increased from 75% to 80%
  • Level 10 Talent +7 armor replaced by +10% Bloodrage Spell Amplification
  • Level 15 Talent +15% Lifesteal replaced by +10% HP Rupture Initial Damage

label: Bounty Hunter
descriptionHtml:
• Shuriken Toss cooldown reduced from 8 to 5
  • Shuriken Toss damage reduced from 150/225/300/375 to 80/120/160/200
  • Shuriken Toss mana cost reduced from 120/125/130/135 to 50/60/70/80
  • Shuriken Toss cast range rescaled from 400 to 375/425/475/525
  • Shuriken Toss scepter no longer reduces cooldown
  • Shuriken Toss scepter cast range increased from 650 to 700
  • Track now also causes Shuriken Toss to deal 1.4/1.7/2.0x damage
  • Jinada can now be toggled to disable autocast.
  • Level 10 Talent +20 Movement Speed replaced with +2s Shadow Walk Slow
  • Level 15 Talent +275 Health replaced with 50% Track Bonus Move Speed to allies
  • Level 20 Talent +50 Attack Speed replaced with Track grants ground vision around the target
  • Level 25 Talent 40% Evasion replaced with 2 Shuriken Toss Charges

label: Brewmaster
descriptionHtml:
• Void Brewling base attack damage reduced from 45-55/65-75/85-95 to 45-55/55-65/65-75
  • Void Brewling base attack time improved from 1.35 to 1.2/1.0/0.8
  • Void Brewling now inherits Brewmaster's Attack Modifiers (e.g: Maelstrom's Chain Lightning, Skadi's Cold Attack, Basher's Bash, etc.)
  • Drunken Brawler passive dodge chance increased from 10/15/20/25% to 15/20/25/30%

label: Bristleback
descriptionHtml:
• Viscous Nasal Goo base slow reduced from 20% to 15%
  • Viscous Nasal Goo scepter radius reduced from 900 to 800
  • Viscous Nasal Goo scepter max stacks reduced from 8 to 7
  • Warpath stack duration increased from 14 to 16

label: Broodmother
descriptionHtml:
• Spin Web now grants Broodmother and her spiderlings movement speed based on the health of the unit. (Grants the full amount at 100% health and 0% when the unit is at 20% health or less)
  • Spawn Spiderlings mana cost increased from 100 to 120
  • Spawn Spiderlings damage reduced from 300/370/440 to 240/320/400
  • Reworked Scepter. Vector Targeted. Broodmother creates a 900 width invisible web line that takes 2 seconds to form. Enemy Heroes that cross the web line will make it visible and become rooted after 0.25s of 100% slow. They will also be visible in fog and receive 100dps for 4 seconds. Broodmother's team is notified in the Minimap whenever someone trips in a Web line. Multiple Heroes can trip on the same line until the duration expires, but illusions don't trigger it. Maximum of 5 Snares can be active and Snares can't be cast overlapping another. 2 Charges: Mana Cost: 100. Cooldown: 20s. Cast Range: 600
  • Level 20 Talent +15 Spider Attack Damage replaced with +50% Spiders Damage to buildings

label: Centaur Warrunner
descriptionHtml:
• Hoof Stomp stun duration decreased from 1.7/2.0/2.3/2.6s to 1.6/1.9/2.2/2.5s
  • Stampede damageStrengthmultiplier increased from 1.5/2.25/3 to 1.75/2.5/3.25
  • Stampede slow duration increased from 2.3s to 2.5s

label: Chaos Knight
descriptionHtml:
• Strengthgain reduced from 3.4 to 3.2
  • Reality Rift cooldown increased from 15/12/9/6 to 18/14/10/6
  • Chaos Strike lifesteal decreased from 25/40/55/70% to 24/36/48/60%
  • Chaos Strike max critical damage increased from 140/170/200/230% to 140/175/210/245%
  • Fixed Strong Illusion buff on Phantasm being dispellable (which would cause illusions to die to illusion killing effects after that)
  • Level 10 talent +20 Movement Speed replaced with +200 Reality Rift Target Pull Distance
  • Level 10 talent +5 all stats replaced with +20% Chaos Strike Lifesteal
  • Level 15 talent +35% Cleave replaced with -3s Chaos Bolt Cooldown

label: Chen
descriptionHtml:
• Divine Favor aura no longer provides Heal Amplification
  • Divine Favor aura now also provides 2/3/4/5 armor
  • Reworked Shard. Allows Holy Persuasion to target 1/2/3 Ancient creeps based on Hand of God level. (Old Scepter effect)
  • Reworked Scepter. Hand of God now applies a Strong Dispel

label: Clinkz
descriptionHtml:
• Strafe removed
  • New Ability: Burning Barrage
    • Channels for 1.5/1.9/2.3/2.7s shooting 3/4/5/6 piercing arrows in the target direction up to 750/800/850/900 distance away, that hit all enemy units dealing 60% attack damage and applying attack modifiers. Arrow width: 200 Cooldown: 28/24/20/16 Mana Cost: 40/50/60/70
  • Searing Arrows mana cost reduced from 12 to 10
  • Skeleton Walk no longer can cast spells without breaking invisibility
  • Death Pact can be casted from Skeleton Walk without breaking invisibility
  • Level 10 Talent +8Agilityreplaced with +12% Magic Resistance
  • Level 15 Talent -7s Skeleton Walk reduced to -5s
  • Level 20 Talent -10s Strafe Cooldown replaced with +2 Burning Barrage Arrows

label: Clockwerk
descriptionHtml:
• Overclocking bonus movement speed decreased from 40% to 30%
  • Level 10 talent +20 Movement Speed replaced with +60 Power Cogs Mana Burn
  • Level 10 talent +5 Armor replaced with -2s Rocket Flare Cooldown

label: Crystal Maiden
descriptionHtml:
• Base attack speed reduced from 115 to 100.
  • Crystal Nova mana cost reduced from 130/145/160/175 to 115/135/155/175
  • Freezing Field explosion distribution is now more even across its radius
  • Freezing Field shard now also increases total explosions by 20%

label: Dark Seer
descriptionHtml:
• Fixed Surge self cast behavior not working with AOE Surge talent
  • Wall of Replica duration reduced from 45s to 30s
  • Normal Punch now has True Strike
  • Normal Punch illusion duration increased from 5s to 8s
  • Normal Punch max damage increased from 250 to 300
  • Level 10 Talent +75 Ion Shell Radius replaced with +20% Wall of Replica Illusion Damage
  • Level 15 Talent +25% Wall of Replica Illusion Damage replaced with +75 Ion Shell Radius
  • Level 20 Talent reduced from +60 Ion Shell damage to +50
  • Level 20 Talent increased from -30s Wall of Replica Cooldown to -35s

label: Dark Willow
descriptionHtml:
• Cursed Crown stun duration reduced from 1.75/2.25/2.75/3.25 to 1.5/2.0/2.5/3.0
  • Level 10 Talent +0.6s Cursed Crown duration reduced to +0.5s
  • Level 20 Talent +50 Damage replaced with +2s Shadow Realm Duration

label: Dawnbreaker
descriptionHtml:
• Starbreaker no longer ignores movement restriction abilities (e.g: Kinetic Field)
  • Starbreaker no longer gets cancelled if Starbreaker gets rooted, instead just the movement is interrupted.
  • Added Aghanim’s Shard. Grants magic immunity during Starbreaker
  • Added Aghanim’s Scepter. Reduces Solar Guardian Channeling time to 1s. Solar Guardian can be cast again upon takeoff to land early. Solar Guardian now gives allies in the area +60% evasion while Dawnbreaker is airborne, increases Heal Per Pulse from 45/70/95 to 60/90/120 and total airborne time by 3.5 seconds
  • Level 10 Talent +7Strengthreplaced with +15% Celestial Hammer Slow
  • Level 10 Talent +20 Movement Speed replaced with +30 Starbreaker Swipe Damage
  • Level 15 Talent +20 Attack Damage replaced with +40% Luminosity Crit Damage
  • Level 20 Talent +40% Luminosity Crit Damage replaced with -1 Luminosity Attacks Required
  • Level 20 Talent 2 Starbreaker charges replaced with +150 Solar Guardian Radius
  • Level 25 Talent +200 Solar Guardian Radius replaced with 2 Starbreaker Charges

label: Dazzle
descriptionHtml:
• BaseAgilityreduced from 21 to 20
  • Poison Touch now only refreshes its duration when Dazzle attacks the target
  • Poison Touch base slow increased from 14/16/18/20 to 16/18/20/22
  • Poison Touch now increases its slow by 2/2.5/3/3.5% every time it's refreshed
  • Shallow Grave mana cost rescaled from 150 to 120/130/140/150
  • Level 15 Talent +225 Heal on Shallow Grave end replaced with +20Strength
  • Level 20 Talent +30 Movement Speed replaced with +250 Heal on Shallow Grave

label: Death Prophet
descriptionHtml:
• BaseStrengthincreased from 19 to 21
  • Silence now fires a 1000 speed projectile towards the targeted area and silences units in the AOE upon impact
  • Silence cast point reduced from 0.4 to 0.2
  • Exorcism cooldown increased from 145 to 150
  • Level 15 Talent +6% Movement Speed replaced with -2s Crypt Swarm Cooldown
  • Level 15 Talent +0.8% Max Health Spirit Siphon increased to +1%
  • Level 20 Talent -3.5s Crypt Swarm Cooldown replaced with +20% Spirit Siphon Slow

label: Disruptor
descriptionHtml:
• Kinetic Field formation time reduced from 1.2 to 1.0
  • Thunder Strike slow per strike duration increased from 0.1s to 0.1/0.2/0.3/0.4s

label: Doom
descriptionHtml:
• Intelligencegain reduced from 2.1 to 1.7
  • Devour bonus gold reduced from 60/120/160/240 to 60/110/160/210
  • Scorched Earth cooldown reduced from 50/45/40/35 to 35
  • Scorched Earth damage increased from 15/30/45/60 to 18/32/46/60
  • Scorched Earth duration rescaled from 15s to 10/12/14/16s
  • Infernal Blade burn base damage increased from 16/20/24/28 to 16/24/32/40
  • Level 15 Talent reduced from -10s Scorched Earth cooldown to -8s
  • Level 25 Talent reduced from +2.4% Infernal Blade Damage to +2.1%

label: Dragon Knight
descriptionHtml:
• Dragon Tail stun duration reduced from 2.5/2.75/3.0/3.25 to 2.25/2.5/2.75/3
  • Dragon Blood health regen reduced from 4/8/12/16 to 3/6/9/12
  • Black Elder Dragon Splash damage reduced from 115% to 100%
  • Black Elder Dragon Magic Resistance reduced from 40% to 20%
  • Fireball DPS reduced from 80 to 60
  • Fireball damage debuff now lingers for 2 seconds

label: Drow Ranger
descriptionHtml:
• Marksmanship bonus damage reduced from 50/70/90 to 40/60/80
  • Frost Arrows scepter Split Arrows no longer consume mana
  • Level 10 Talent +5 All Stats replaced with +15 Frost Arrow Bonus Damage
  • Level 15 Talent +10Agilityreplaced with +250 Gust Width
  • Level 25 talent 30% Cooldown Reduction replaced with +2 Multishot Waves

label: Earth Spirit
descriptionHtml:
• Stone Remnant charge replenish time decreased from 25s to 20s
  • Level 10 Talent +60 damage replaced with +2s Magnetize Duration
  • Level 15 talent +8 Armor replaced with +300 Boulder Smash Push Distance

label: Earthshaker
descriptionHtml:
• Movement Speed increased from 310 to 315
  • Intelligenceincreased from 16 + 1.8 to 18 + 2.1
  • Level 10 Talent +20 base damage increased to +30
  • Level 10 Talent +200 mana replaced with +80 Fissure Damage
  • Level 15 Talent +7 armor replaced with +50 Aftershock Damage
  • Level 25 Talent +40% Magic Resistance replaced with +200 Aftershock Radius

label: Elder Titan
descriptionHtml:
• Echo Stomp damage reduced from 70/100/130/160 to 70/90/110/130
  • Astral Spirit duration increased from 8s to 10

label: Ember Spirit
descriptionHtml:
• Searing Chains damage per second rescaled from 50/75/90/100 to 50/70/90/110
  • Flame Guard absorb amount increased from 80/220/360/500 to 110/240/370/500
  • Fire Remnant Aghanim's Scepter maximum travel distance reduced from 3500 to 3000
  • Level 20 Talent +8% Spell Amplification replaced with +1 Searing Chains Targets

label: Enchantress
descriptionHtml:
• Enchant range reduced from 700 to 500/550/600/650
  • Level 10 Talent reduced from +12% Magic Resistance to +10%
  • Level 15 Talent increased from +40 damage to +45
  • Level 15 Talent reduced from +6 Nature's Attendance Wisps to +5

label: Enigma
descriptionHtml:
• Midnight Pulse multiple instances no longer stack
  • Black Hole scepter now deals 5% bonus pure damage instead of the current level of Midnight Pulse
  • Level 10 Talent +135 Eidolon Health replaced with +20 Eidolon Attack Speed
  • Level 15 Talent +8% Cooldown Reduction replaced with +30 Malefice Damage per Instance

label: Faceless Void
descriptionHtml:
• Chronosphere cooldown reduced from 160s to 160/150/140s
  • Level 10 Talent +7Agilityreplaced with +6 Time Dilation Damage Per Second
  • Level 10 Talent +9Strengthreplaced with +0.5s Time Walk Backtracked Time
  • Level 15 Talent +300 Health replaced with -1.5s Time Walk Cooldown
  • Level 15 Talent +55 Time Lock Damage replaced with +7% Time Dilation slow per Cooldown
  • Level 20 Talent +40 Attack Speed replaced with +120 Attack Speed in Chronosphere
  • Level 20 Talent -2s Time Walk Cooldown replaced with +70 Time Lock Damage

label: Grimstroke
descriptionHtml:
• Stroke of Fate damage increment per hit increased from 16/24/32/40 to 18/27/36/45
  • Ink Swell duration increased from 3s to 4s

label: Gyrocopter
descriptionHtml:
• AgilityGain reduced from 3.6 to 3.3
  • IntelligenceGain increased from 2.1 to 2.4
  • Reworked Shard. Homing Missile now constantly fires a 700 radius Rocket Barrage, starting 1 second after casting. Rocket Barrage prioritizes the Homing Missile's target
  • Flak Cannon range reduced from 1250 to 1000
  • Call Down cooldown reduced from 90 to 90/75/60
  • Level 10 Talent +16 Attack Damage replaced by +300 Flak Cannon Range
  • Level 15 Talent -40s Call Down cooldown to +2 Flak Cannon attacks
  • Level 25 Talent 3 Homing Missile Charges replaced with -6s Flak Cannon Cooldown
  • Level 25 Talent Global Call Down replaced with Air Strike. Causes Call Down to be vector targeted and fires 3 Call Down attacks in the vector direction, 500 range and 0.75 seconds from each other. Secondary call downs deal 50% damage

label: Hoodwink
descriptionHtml:
• Movement Speed reduced from 320 to 310
  • Bushwhack damage is now dealt over time on a 0.3s interval for the duration of the debuff. (Damage stops if hero is released)
  • Decoy now throws a Lesser Bushwhack towards the unit that attacked the illusion and spawns a tree in its location
  • Decoy cooldown reduced from 40s to 25s
  • Decoy stun duration increased from 1s to 2s
  • Hunter's Boomerang can now be ground targeted
  • Level 10 Talent +200 Health replaced with +1s Scurry Duration
  • Level 15 Talent +16Agilityreplaced with +2 Acorn Shot Bounces

label: Huskar
descriptionHtml:
• Movement Speed increased from 290 to 295
  • Inner Fire Shard no longer reduces Healing by 50%
  • Inner Fire Shard now heals Huskar for 50% of the damage dealt to heroes and 10% of damage dealt to creeps
  • Level 10 Talent +175 Health replaced with +1s Inner Fire Duration
  • Level 10 Talent +12 Attack Damage replaced with +2s Life Break Slow Duration
  • Level 25 Talent +25% Spell Lifesteal replaced with +16% Life Break Damage

label: Invoker
descriptionHtml:
• Base Movement Speed reduced from 280 to 275
  • Tornado lift duration rescaled from 0.8 ->2.9 to 0.85->2.6
  • Chaos Meteor main damage rescaled from 57.5->180 to 52->185
  • Chaos Meteor burn damage rescaled from 11.5->36 to 10->38
  • Deafening Blast damage reduced from 40->320 to 20->300
  • Deafening Blast knockback reduced from 0.25->2.0s to 0.2->1.6s
  • Level 15 Talent +60dps Ice Wall replaced with +1 Forged Spirit Armor Reduction
  • Level 25 Talent +2 Forged Spirit Armor Reduction replaced with 2.5x Quas/Wex/Exort Passive Bonuses

label: Io
descriptionHtml:
• Tether max Tether distance increased from 900 to 1000
  • Tether heal amplification increased from 0.6/0.8/1.0/1.2 to 0.7/0.9/1.1/1.3

label: Jakiro
descriptionHtml:
• Dual Breath cast point improved from 0.55 to 0.35
  • Liquid Fire burn damage increased from 12/16/20/24 to 15/20/25/30
  • Macropyre cooldown increased from 60 to 80/70/60

label: Juggernaut
descriptionHtml:
• Blade Fury damage increased from 85/110/135/160 to 90/115/140/165
  • Healing Ward movement Speed reduced from 350 to 325
  • Level 10 Talent +20 Movement Speed replaced with +75 Blade Fury Radius

label: Keeper of the Light
descriptionHtml:
• Base Armor increased by 1
  • Illuminate channel time rescaled from 2/2.7/3.4/4.1s to 3s
  • Chakra Magic cooldown reduced from 20/18/16/14 to 18/16/14/12

label: Kunkka
descriptionHtml:
• Ghost Ship Fleet Interval increased from 3.35s to 3.5s
  • Torrent move speed slow rescaled from -35% to -25/-30/-35/-40%
  • Tidebringer cleave percentage reduced from 165% to 150%
  • Tidebringer bonus damage increased from 25/50/75/100 to 30/60/90/120

label: Legion Commander
descriptionHtml:
• Fixed Press The Attack Level 25 Talent AOE not working correctly with Self Cast
  • Level 10 Talent +7Strengthreplaced with +200 Duel Cast Range
  • Level 10 Talent +1.5 Mana Regen replaced with +100 Overwhelming Odds Radius

label: Leshrac

  • Sinister Gaze mana cost reduced from 120/130/140/150 to 80

  • Infest Scepter now also applies Disarm to the enemy

descriptionHtml:

descriptionHtml:

descriptionHtml:
• Strengthgain reduced from 1.8 to 1.6
  • Agilitygain reduced from 1.8 to 1.6
  • Poof damage reduced from 60/80/100/120 to 45/60/75/90
  • Poof now deals Pure Damage
  • Reworked Shard: Divided we Stand can be cast from any Meepo as long as there's another Meepo within 300 radius, causing the nearby Meepo to fling you towards a target within 900 range, dealing 100 damage and slowing the target's movement speed by 50%. Cooldown 18/16/14s Mana Cost: 100 (Each Meepo has its own independent cooldown)
  • Level 15 talent reduced from +50 Poof Damage to +40

descriptionHtml:

descriptionHtml:
• Tree Dance cast point decreased from 0.3 to 0.1
  • Tree Dance travel speed increased from 700 to 800

  • Level 10 Talent +20 Attack Speed replaced with +0.3s Boundless Strike Stun
  • Level 20 Talent +40% Boundless Strike Crit replaced with +2 Jingu Mastery Charges

descriptionHtml:

label: Spectre
descriptionHtml:
• Reworked Shard: Causes dispersion to fire a spectral dagger every 300 damage absorbed in the direction of the last source of damage. Can fire a maximum of one dagger every 7 seconds and only triggers off player based damage within 700 range
  • Spectral Dagger debuff is now dispellable
  • Fixed Shadow Step being able to target creep hero units
  • Level 10 Talent +5 HP Regen replaced with -5s Spectral Dagger Cooldown
  • Level 15 Talent -8s Spectral Dagger Cooldown replaced with +100 Spectral Dagger Damage

descriptionHtml:

  • Charge of Darkness mana cost increased from 70/80/90/100 to 100

  • Level 20 Talent -5.5s Bulldoze Cooldown replaced with +200 movement speed during Charge of Darkness.
  • Level 20 Talent +12% Greater Bash Damage replaced with +10% Greater Bash Chance
  • Level 25 Talent +20% Greater Bash Chance replaced with +25% Greater Bash Damage

  • Level 10 talent +100 Psi Blades Range replaced with +110 Psionic Trap Damage
  • Level 15 talent +180 Psionic Trap Damage replaced with +120 Psi Blades Range

  • Laser Shrink Ray hp reduction reduced from 15% to 10%

  • Defense Matrix cooldown reduced from 30 to 12

  • New Rearm Sub-ability: Keen Conveyance. Channel for 4.5/4/3.5s to teleport to a friendly Building. Level 2 allows targeting units and level 3 allows targeting heroes. Mana cost: 75
  • March of the Machines is now a shard ability
  • March of the Machines mana cost increased from 130/150/170/190 to 190
  • March of the Machines robot explosion damage rescaled from 16/24/32/40 to 30

  • Level 20 Talent +8 Armor replaced with +10% Spell Amplification

descriptionHtml:

  • Level 10 Talent +7Agilityreplaced with +25 Berserker's Rage Movement Speed

descriptionHtml:

  • Snowball bonus damage per hero increased from 20/40/60/80 to 25/50/75/100

label: Underlord
descriptionHtml:
• Base movement speed reduced from 295 to 290
  • Firestorm mana cost increased from 100/110/120/130 to 110/120/130/140
  • Reworked Scepter: Grants a new ability: Fiend's Gate. Cast within 4000 range to create a Portal next to Underlord and a Portal at the target location. Allies can click on either Portal to teleport to the other one after a 2s channel. Portals are indestructible, last 20 seconds, and can only be cast in locations where Wards can be placed
  • Level 20 Talent +60 Attack Speed replaced with +1% Firestorm Burn Damage

  • Summon Familiars cooldown reduced from 130 to 130/120/110
  • Summon Familiars armor increased from 0/1/2 to 0/2/4
  • Summon Familiars turn rate increased from 0.5 to 0.9

label: Void Spirit
descriptionHtml:
• Aether Remnant mana cost reduced from 85/90/95/100 to 75/80/85/90
  • Aether Remnant pull duration increased from 1.2/1.4/1.6/1.8 to 1.4/1.6/1.8/2.0
  • Astral Step debuff damage increased from 150/200/250 to 150/250/350
  • Level 10 Talent +15 Damage replaced with +60 Aether Remnant Damage

label: Warlock
descriptionHtml: • Level 15 Talent +40 DPS Upheaval replaced by +10% Attack Speed per second to allies (Maximum 70%)

label: Weaver
descriptionHtml:
• The Swarm travel speed increased from 600 to 750
  • The Swarm now ignores damage block
  • Geminate Attack can now be toggled to disable autocast
  • Level 10 Talent +0.2 Swarm Armor Reduction replaced with +9Strength
  • Level 15 Talent +12Strengthreplaced with +2 Swarm Attacks to Kill
  • Level 20 Talent +35 damage replaced with +90 Geminate Attack Damage
  • Level 20 Talent +3 Swarm Attacks to Kill replaced with +0.5 Swarm Armor Reduction

label: Windranger
descriptionHtml:
• Reworked Shard: Now Grants Gale Force. Vector Targeted: Summons a strong wind that pushes all enemies within a 1000 AoE by 250 units per second in the target direction for 3 seconds (Units can still move, attack and cast spells, does not interrupt channeling). Mana Cost: 150 Cooldown: 40s
  • Level 15 Talent +100 Attack Range replaced with Windrun Undispellable
  • Level 25 Talent 25% Cooldown Reduction replaced with Focus Fire Kills Advance Cooldown by 20s

label: Winter Wyvern
descriptionHtml:
• Agilitygain reduced from 1.9 to 1.7
  • Arctic Burn attack range bonus decreased from 350/425/500/575 to 350/400/450/500
  • Arctic Burn movement speed slow reduced from 22/28/34/40% to 16/24/32/40%
  • Winter's Curse cast range reduced from 800 to 700
  • Cold Embrace Shard cooldown reduction reduced from 5s to 4s
  • Cold Embrace percentage heal reduced from 2/3/4/5% to 1.75/2.5/3.25/4%
  • Level 10 Talent +50 Damage reduced to +35
  • Level 10 Talent +1.5% Cold Embrace Heal replaced with +25HP/s Cold Embrace Heal
  • Level 15 Talent +275 Health replaced with +2s Arctic Burn Debuff Duration
  • Level 15 Talent +400 Night Vision replaced with +400 Splinter Blast Radius

label: Witch Doctor
descriptionHtml:
• Paralyzing Cask creep damage rescaled from 50/70/125/150 to 75
  • Paralyzing Cask hero damage reduced from 50/60/70/80 to 40
  • Paralyzing Cask deals 10/15/20/25 more damage per each bounce
  • Level 10 Talent +60 damage replaced with -25% Voodoo Restoration Mana Per Second
  • Level 10 Talent +200 Health replaced with +75 Maledict Radius
  • Level 15 Talent +100 Maledict Radius replaced with +300 Health

label: Wraith King
descriptionHtml:
• Reincarnation cooldown increased from 200/120/40 to 200/130/60
  • Level 10 Talent +0.5s Wraithfire Blast duration replaced with +20 Movement Speed
  • Level 15 Talent +25 Movement Speed replaced with +0.7s Wraithfire Blast Stun Duration
  • Level 20 Talent +16Strengthreplaced with +25% Cleave

label: Zeus
descriptionHtml:
• Lightning Bolt mana cost reduced from 125/130/135/140 to 120/125/130/135
  • Lightning Bolt vision duration increased from 4.5s to 5
  • Static Field Shard active mana cost reduced from 100 to 75
  • Static Field Shard active now grants 900 radius unobstructed vision around Zeus for 3 seconds
  • Nimbus duration reduced from 35s to 30s
  • Nimbus Lightning Bolt interval increased from 2.25s to 2.5s
  • Nimbus bounty increased from 100 to 125
  • Level 25 Talent +50% Spell Lifesteal replaced with 325 range AoE Lightning Bolt
